title: Organization
description: information that uniquely identifies an organized entity such as company, non-profit, government agency or educational institution, plus additional information that further qualifies the organization.

id.title: Organization Id
id.description: A unique identifier for the organization.

legalName.title: Organization Name
legalName.description: The official name of the organization.

numberOfEmployees.title: Number of Employees
numberOfEmployees.description: The number of employees the organization has.

industry.title: Industry
industry.description: The the industry that this organization is a part of.

duns.title: Dun & Bradstreet number
duns.description: The Dun & Bradstreet DUNS number for identifying an organization or business person.

website.title: Web Site
website.description: The url of the organization's website.

marketSegment.title: Market Segment
marketSegment.description: The named market segment that the organization participates in.

location.title: Location
location.description: The location of the organization's main office.

rating.title: Rating
rating.description: The calculated score or star rating for this organization.
